title: Ep 114: The Next Right Thing with Dani Shapiro
itunes:title: Ep 114: The Next Right Thing with Dani Shapiro
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate chat about ingrown hairs, the intimacy of video-chatting with friends during quarantine, and exercising at home. They they talk to Dani Shapiro, author of the New York Times best-selling memoir, Inheritance, and host of the podcast Famil...
description:
Doree and Kate chat about ingrown hairs, the intimacy of video-chatting with friends during quarantine, and exercising at home. They they talk to Dani Shapiro, author of the New York Times best-selling memoir, Inheritance, and host of the podcast Family Secrets. She discusses her meditation practice, how she finds comfort during stressful times, and the experience of discovering her own family secret following a DNA test.


Listen to our new daily podcast Here For You on Apple Podcasts or ACast.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
